title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Are There 60 Minutes In An Hour Instead of 100?
itunes:title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Are There 60 Minutes In An Hour Instead of 100?
description:
Lots of human mathematics are based around multiples of the number 10 -- so why do we measure time in multiples of 12? Learn more in this classic episode of BrainStuff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
